molecular.io.read_dcd¶

molecular.io.read_dcd(filename, topology=None)[source]¶

Read in DCD file with filename. This function is partially based off James Phillips’ code MDTools that is no longer in development. See http://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Development/MDTools/Python/

https://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Research/namd/wiki/index.cgi?ReadingDCDinFortran

Parameters

  • filename (str) – Name of DCD file.

  • topology (molecular.Topology) – (Optional) Topology file to load for coordinates.

Returns

Instance of Trajectory object.

Return type

molecular.Trajectory

molecular
